title: Uber pushing AMBER Alerts to its drivers nationwide, after initial pilot in Colorado
text:
Uber pushing AMBER Alerts to its drivers nationwide, after initial pilot in Colorado 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Today 
Uber has announced that it will be sending location-based AMBER alerts to its drivers across all 180 U.S. cities in which it operates, follo... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
